metadata.title: CVE-2014-8139 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the CRC32 verification in Info-ZIP UnZip 6.0and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a craftedzip file in the -t command argument to the unzip command.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8139` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

unzip - 6.0-9ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unzip package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.0-9ubuntu1.1').
